title: Ordering on real numbers - Real and complex numbers basic operations

blocks.name: sub2times
blocks.content: Subtracting from a number, twice the number itself, gives negative the number. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm sub2times(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cc), wceq(co(c0, cmin, co(nat2, cmul, c0)), cneg(c0)))

  2times(c0)
  negsubd(c0, co(c0, caddc, c0), wcel(c0, cc))
  addcld(c0, c0, wcel(c0, cc))
  3eqtr2d(co(c0, caddc, cneg(co(c0, caddc, c0))), cneg(c0), co(c0, caddc, co(cneg(c0), caddc, cneg(c0))), co(co(c0, caddc, cneg(c0)), caddc, cneg(c0)), wcel(c0, cc))
  oveq2d(c0, caddc, cneg(co(c0, caddc, c0)), co(cneg(c0), caddc, cneg(c0)), wcel(c0, cc))
  negdid(c0, c0, wcel(c0, cc))
  addassd(c0, cneg(c0), cneg(c0), wcel(c0, cc))
  id(wcel(c0, cc))
  eqtrd(co(co(c0, caddc, cneg(c0)), caddc, cneg(c0)), cneg(c0), co(nat0, caddc, cneg(c0)), wcel(c0, cc))
  oveq1d(co(c0, caddc, cneg(c0)), caddc, cneg(c0), nat0, wcel(c0, cc))
  negid(c0)
  addid2d(cneg(c0), wcel(c0, cc))

blocks.name: elfzfzo

thm dstregt0(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ+, ∀(s1 ∈ ℝ, s0[<](abs `(c0[-]s1)))))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈(ℂ \ ℝ))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  syl2anc(w0, ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ+, ∀(s1 ∈ ℝ, s0[<](abs `(c0[-]s1)))), ((abs `(Im ` c0))[÷]2)∈ ℝ+, ∀(s1 ∈ ℝ,((abs `(Im ` c0))[÷]2)[<](abs `(c0[-]s1))))
  rphalfcld((abs `(Im ` c0)), w0)
  absrpcld((Im ` c0), w0)
  ralrimiva(s1, cr, w0, ((abs `(Im ` c0))[÷]2)[<](abs `(c0[-]s1)))
  eqbrtrd(((abs `(Im ` c0))[÷]2), clt, (abs `(c0[-]s1)), ((abs `(Im `(c0[-]s1)))[÷]2), (w0 ∧ s1 ∈ ℝ))
  oveq1d((abs `(Im ` c0)), cdiv, nat2, (abs `(Im `(c0[-]s1))), (w0 ∧ s1 ∈ ℝ))
  fveq2d(cabs, (Im ` c0), (Im `(c0[-]s1)), (w0 ∧ s1 ∈ ℝ))
  ltletrd(((abs `(Im `(c0[-]s1)))[÷]2), (abs `(c0[-]s1)), (abs `(Im `(c0[-]s1))), (w0 ∧ s1 ∈ ℝ))
  rehalfcld((abs `(Im `(c0[-]s1))), (w0 ∧ s1 ∈ ℝ))
  abscld((Im `(c0[-]s1)), (w0 ∧ s1 ∈ ℝ))
  abscld((c0[-]s1), (w0 ∧ s1 ∈ ℝ))
  syl((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ ℝ), ((abs `(Im `(c0[-]s1)))[÷]2)[<](abs `(Im `(c0[-]s1))), (abs `(Im `(c0[-]s1)))∈ ℝ+)
  absrpcld((Im `(c0[-]s1)), (w0 ∧ s1 ∈ ℝ))

blocks.name: subadd4b

blocks.origin:
thm subadd4b(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, cmin, c1), caddc, co(c2, cmin, c3)), co(co(c0, cmin, c3), caddc, co(c2, cmin, c1))))

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cc))
} = {
  3eqtr3d(co(co(c0, cmin, c1), caddc, co(c2, cmin, c3)), co(co(c0, cmin, c3), caddc, co(c2, cmin, c1)), co(co(c0, cmin, c1), cmin, co(c3, cmin, c2)), co(co(c0, caddc, c2), cmin, co(c1, caddc, c3)), w0)
  subadd4d(c0, c1, c3, c2, w0)
  subsub2d(co(c0, cmin, c1), c3, c2, w0)
  subcld(c0, c1, w0)
  eqtrd(co(co(c0, caddc, c2), cmin, co(c1, caddc, c3)), co(co(c0, cmin, c3), caddc, co(c2, cmin, c1)), co(co(c0, caddc, c2), cmin, co(c3, caddc, c1)), w0)
  oveq2d(co(c0, caddc, c2), cmin, co(c1, caddc, c3), co(c3, caddc, c1), w0)
  addcomd(c1, c3, w0)
  addsub4d(c0, c2, c3, c1, w0)

  1red(w0)
  zred(co(c1, cmin, c2), w0)

blocks.name: sub31

  addcomd(c0, co(c2, cmin, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(co(c2, cmin, c1), cc))
  subcld(c2, c1, wa(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  simpr(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc))
  simpl(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc))
  subsub2(c0, c1, c2)

  simp3(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc))
  simp2(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc))
  simp1(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc))
}

  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ ∧ c2 ∈ ℂ)→(c0[-](c1[-]c2))=(c2[-](c1[-]c0)))
} = {
  3eqtr4d((c0[-](c1[-]c2)), (c2[-](c1[-]c0)), (c0[+](c2[-]c1)), ((c2[-]c1)[+]c0), (c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ ∧ c2 ∈ ℂ))

  simp2(c0 ∈ ℂ, c1 ∈ ℂ, c2 ∈ ℂ)
  simp1(c0 ∈ ℂ, c1 ∈ ℂ, c2 ∈ ℂ)
}

thm monoords(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {

blocks.name: hashssle
blocks.content: The size of a subset of a finite set is less than the size of the containing set. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.) TODO (NM): usage (2 times) should be replaced by ~ hashss , and ~ hashssle should be deleted afterwards.

blocks.name: lttri5d
blocks.content: Not equal and not larger implies smaller. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)

blocks.name: fzisoeu
blocks.content: A finite ordered set has a unique order isomorphism to a generic finite sequence of integers. This theorem generalizes ~ fz1iso for the base index and also states the uniqueness condition. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)

blocks.name: lt3addmuld
blocks.content: If three real numbers are less than a fourth real number, the sum of the three real numbers is less than three times the third real number. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)

blocks.name: absnpncan2d

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cc))

} = {
  letrd(cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmin, c1)), co(co(cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmin, c2)), caddc, cfv(cabs, co(c2, cmin, c3))), caddc, cfv(cabs, co(c3, cmin, c1))), co(cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmin, c3)), caddc, cfv(cabs, co(c3, cmin, c1))), w0)
  abscld(co(c0, cmin, c1), w0)
  subcld(c0, c1, w0)
  readdcld(cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmin, c3)), cfv(cabs, co(c3, cmin, c1)), w0)
  readdcld(co(cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmin, c2)), caddc, cfv(cabs, co(c2, cmin, c3))), cfv(cabs, co(c3, cmin, c1)), w0)
  abs3difd(c0, c1, c3, w0)
  leadd1dd(cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmin, c3)), cfv(cabs, co(c3, cmin, c1)), co(cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmin, c2)), caddc, cfv(cabs, co(c2, cmin, c3))), w0)
  abscld(co(c0, cmin, c3), w0)
  subcld(c0, c3, w0)
  readdcld(cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmin, c2)), cfv(cabs, co(c2, cmin, c3)), w0)
  abscld(co(c0, cmin, c2), w0)

}

  ⊢ (w0 →(abs `(c0[-]c1))[≤](((abs `(c0[-]c2))[+](abs `(c2[-]c3)))[+](abs `(c3[-]c1))))

  readdcld((abs `(c0[-]c2)), (abs `(c2[-]c3)), w0)

  diff.wceq.s(s0, cfv(c0, co(co(c1, caddc, co(cv(hs1), cmul, c3)), caddc, c3)), cfv(c0, co(c1, caddc, co(cv(hs1), cmul, c3))))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0, co(co(c1, caddc, co(cv(hs1), cmul, c3)), caddc, c3))

  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)

blocks.name: fperiodmul
blocks.content: A function with period T is also periodic with period multiple of T. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm fperiodmul(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, co(c1, caddc, co(c2, cmul, c3))), cfv(c0, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, cr, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr)), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), caddc, c3)), cfv(c0, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  pm2.61dan(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, co(c1, caddc, co(c2, cmul, c3))), cfv(c0, c1)), wcel(c2, cn0))
  fperiodmullem(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, wa(w0, wcel(c2, cn0)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c2, cn0), wf(c0, cr, cc))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c2, cn0), wcel(c3, cr))
  simpr(w0, wcel(c2, cn0))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c2, cn0), wcel(c1, cr))
  adantlr(w0, wcel(c2, cn0), wcel(cv(s0), cr), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), caddc, c3)), cfv(c0, cv(s0))))
  3eqtr2d(cfv(c0, co(c1, caddc, co(c2, cmul, c3))), cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, co(c1, cmin, co(cneg(c2), cmul, c3))), cfv(c0, co(co(c1, cmin, co(cneg(c2), cmul, c3)), caddc, co(cneg(c2), cmul, c3))), wa(w0, wn(wcel(c2, cn0))))
  adantr(w0, wn(wcel(c2, cn0)), wceq(cfv(c0, co(c1, caddc, co(c2, cmul, c3))), cfv(c0, co(c1, cmin, co(cneg(c2), cmul, c3)))))
  fveq2d(c0, co(c1, caddc, co(c2, cmul, c3)), co(c1, cmin, co(cneg(c2), cmul, c3)), w0)
  eqtr3d(co(c1, caddc, co(c2, cmul, c3)), co(c1, cmin, co(cneg(c2), cmul, c3)), co(c1, cmin, cneg(co(c2, cmul, c3))), w0)
  subnegd(c1, co(c2, cmul, c3), w0)
  recnd(c1, w0)
  mulcld(c2, c3, w0)
  oveq2d(c1, cmin, cneg(co(c2, cmul, c3)), co(cneg(c2), cmul, c3), w0)
  eqcomd(cneg(co(c2, cmul, c3)), co(cneg(c2), cmul, c3), w0)
  mulneg1d(c2, c3, w0)
  zcnd(c2, w0)
  recnd(c3, w0)
  fperiodmullem(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, co(cneg(c2), cmul, c3)), cneg(c2), c3, wa(w0, wn(wcel(c2, cn0))))
  adantr(w0, wn(wcel(c2, cn0)), wf(c0, cr, cc))
  nnnn0d(cneg(c2), wa(w0, wn(wcel(c2, cn0))))
  sylan(w0, wn(wcel(c2, cn0)), wcel(cneg(c2), cn), wcel(c2, cz))
  znnn0nn(c2)
  resubcld(c1, co(cneg(c2), cmul, c3), wa(w0, wn(wcel(c2, cn0))))
  remulcld(cneg(c2), c3, wa(w0, wn(wcel(c2, cn0))))
  renegcld(c2, wa(w0, wn(wcel(c2, cn0))))
  adantlr(w0, wn(wcel(c2, cn0)), wcel(cv(s0), cr), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), caddc, c3)), cfv(c0, cv(s0))))
  fveq2d(c0, co(co(c1, cmin, co(cneg(c2), cmul, c3)), caddc, co(cneg(c2), cmul, c3)), c1, wa(w0, wn(wcel(c2, cn0))))
  npcand(c1, co(cneg(c2), cmul, c3), wa(w0, wn(wcel(c2, cn0))))
  recnd(c1, wa(w0, wn(wcel(c2, cn0))))
  adantr(w0, wn(wcel(c2, cn0)), wcel(c1, cr))

blocks.pretty:
thm fperiodmul(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 `(c1[+](c2[×]c3)))=(c0 ` c1))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0 : ℝ → ℂ))
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ)→(c0 `(s0[+]c3))=(c0 ` s0))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  pm2.61dan(w0, (c0 `(c1[+](c2[×]c3)))=(c0 ` c1), c2 ∈ ℕ0)
  fperiodmullem(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, (w0 ∧ c2 ∈ ℕ0))
  adantr(w0, c2 ∈ ℕ0, (c0 : ℝ → ℂ))
  adantr(w0, c2 ∈ ℕ0, c3 ∈ ℝ)
  simpr(w0, c2 ∈ ℕ0)
  adantr(w0, c2 ∈ ℕ0, c1 ∈ ℝ)
  adantlr(w0, c2 ∈ ℕ0, s0 ∈ ℝ, (c0 `(s0[+]c3))=(c0 ` s0))
  3eqtr2d((c0 `(c1[+](c2[×]c3))), (c0 ` c1), (c0 `(c1[-](-u(c2)[×]c3))), (c0 `((c1[-](-u(c2)[×]c3))[+](-u(c2)[×]c3))), (w0 ∧ ¬ c2 ∈ ℕ0))
  adantr(w0, ¬ c2 ∈ ℕ0, (c0 `(c1[+](c2[×]c3)))=(c0 `(c1[-](-u(c2)[×]c3))))
  fveq2d(c0, (c1[+](c2[×]c3)), (c1[-](-u(c2)[×]c3)), w0)
  eqtr3d((c1[+](c2[×]c3)), (c1[-](-u(c2)[×]c3)), (c1[-]-u((c2[×]c3))), w0)
  subnegd(c1, (c2[×]c3), w0)
  recnd(c1, w0)
  mulcld(c2, c3, w0)
  oveq2d(c1, cmin, -u((c2[×]c3)), (-u(c2)[×]c3), w0)
  eqcomd(-u((c2[×]c3)), (-u(c2)[×]c3), w0)
  mulneg1d(c2, c3, w0)
  zcnd(c2, w0)
  recnd(c3, w0)
  fperiodmullem(s0, c0, (c1[-](-u(c2)[×]c3)), -u(c2), c3, (w0 ∧ ¬ c2 ∈ ℕ0))
  adantr(w0, ¬ c2 ∈ ℕ0, (c0 : ℝ → ℂ))
  nnnn0d(-u(c2), (w0 ∧ ¬ c2 ∈ ℕ0))
  sylan(w0, ¬ c2 ∈ ℕ0, -u(c2)∈ ℕ, c2 ∈ ℤ)
  znnn0nn(c2)
  resubcld(c1, (-u(c2)[×]c3), (w0 ∧ ¬ c2 ∈ ℕ0))
  remulcld(-u(c2), c3, (w0 ∧ ¬ c2 ∈ ℕ0))
  renegcld(c2, (w0 ∧ ¬ c2 ∈ ℕ0))
  adantlr(w0, ¬ c2 ∈ ℕ0, s0 ∈ ℝ, (c0 `(s0[+]c3))=(c0 ` s0))
  fveq2d(c0, ((c1[-](-u(c2)[×]c3))[+](-u(c2)[×]c3)), c1, (w0 ∧ ¬ c2 ∈ ℕ0))
  npcand(c1, (-u(c2)[×]c3), (w0 ∧ ¬ c2 ∈ ℕ0))
  recnd(c1, (w0 ∧ ¬ c2 ∈ ℕ0))
  adantr(w0, ¬ c2 ∈ ℕ0, c1 ∈ ℝ)
  mulcld(-u(c2), c3, (w0 ∧ ¬ c2 ∈ ℕ0))
  negcld(c2, (w0 ∧ ¬ c2 ∈ ℕ0))
  recnd(c2, (w0 ∧ ¬ c2 ∈ ℕ0))
  zred(c2, (w0 ∧ ¬ c2 ∈ ℕ0))
  adantr(w0, ¬ c2 ∈ ℕ0, c2 ∈ ℤ)
  recnd(c3, (w0 ∧ ¬ c2 ∈ ℕ0))
  adantr(w0, ¬ c2 ∈ ℕ0, c3 ∈ ℝ)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, c2 ∈ ℕ0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c1, cmin, (-u(c2)[×]c3))
  diff.cmin.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, -u(c2), cmul, c3)
  diff.cneg.s(s0, c2)
  diff.cmul.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, ¬ c2 ∈ ℕ0)
  diff.wn.s(s0, c2 ∈ ℕ0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, cn0)
  diff.cn0.s(s0)
}

  simp3(wa(w0, wral(s0, c1, wbr(c2, cle, cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  syl2anc(w3a(wa(w0, wral(s0, c1, wbr(c2, cle, cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s1)), wral(s0, c1, wbr(c2, cle, cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  simp1r(w0, wral(s0, c1, wbr(c2, cle, cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))

blocks.name: lt4addmuld
blocks.content: If four real numbers are less than a fifth real number, the sum of the four real numbers is less than four times the fifth real number. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm lt4addmuld(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), caddc, c2), caddc, c3), clt, co(nat4, cmul, c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, clt, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c1, clt, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c2, clt, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c3, clt, c4))
} = {
  breqtrd(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), caddc, c2), caddc, c3), clt, co(nat4, cmul, c4), co(co(nat3, cmul, c4), caddc, c4), w0)
  lt2addd(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), caddc, c2), c3, co(nat3, cmul, c4), c4, w0)
  readdcld(co(c0, caddc, c1), c2, w0)
  readdcld(c0, c1, w0)
  remulcld(nat3, c4, w0)
  lt3addmuld(c0, c1, c2, c4, w0)
  eqtr2d(co(co(nat3, cmul, c4), caddc, c4), co(nat4, cmul, c4), co(co(nat3, caddc, nat1), cmul, c4), w0)
  oveq1d(nat4, cmul, c4, co(nat3, caddc, nat1), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(nat4, co(nat3, caddc, nat1)))
  df-4()
  adddirp1d(nat3, c4, w0)
  recnd(nat3, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(nat3, cr))
  3re()
  recnd(c4, w0)
}

blocks.name: absnpncan3d
blocks.content: Triangular inequality, combined with cancellation law for subtraction (applied three times). (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm absnpncan3d(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmin, c1)), cle, co(co(co(cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmin, c2)), caddc, cfv(cabs, co(c2, cmin, c3))), caddc, cfv(cabs, co(c3, cmin, c4))), caddc, cfv(cabs, co(c4, cmin, c1)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))
} = {
  letrd(cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmin, c1)), co(co(co(cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmin, c2)), caddc, cfv(cabs, co(c2, cmin, c3))), caddc, cfv(cabs, co(c3, cmin, c4))), caddc, cfv(cabs, co(c4, cmin, c1))), co(cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmin, c4)), caddc, cfv(cabs, co(c4, cmin, c1))), w0)
  abscld(co(c0, cmin, c1), w0)
  subcld(c0, c1, w0)
  readdcld(cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmin, c4)), cfv(cabs, co(c4, cmin, c1)), w0)
  readdcld(co(co(cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmin, c2)), caddc, cfv(cabs, co(c2, cmin, c3))), caddc, cfv(cabs, co(c3, cmin, c4))), cfv(cabs, co(c4, cmin, c1)), w0)
  abs3difd(c0, c1, c4, w0)
  leadd1dd(cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmin, c4)), cfv(cabs, co(c4, cmin, c1)), co(co(cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmin, c2)), caddc, cfv(cabs, co(c2, cmin, c3))), caddc, cfv(cabs, co(c3, cmin, c4))), w0)
  abscld(co(c0, cmin, c4), w0)
  subcld(c0, c4, w0)
  readdcld(co(cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmin, c2)), caddc, cfv(cabs, co(c2, cmin, c3))), cfv(cabs, co(c3, cmin, c4)), w0)
  readdcld(cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmin, c2)), cfv(cabs, co(c2, cmin, c3)), w0)
  abscld(co(c0, cmin, c2), w0)
  subcld(c0, c2, w0)
  abscld(co(c2, cmin, c3), w0)
  subcld(c2, c3, w0)
  abscld(co(c3, cmin, c4), w0)
  subcld(c3, c4, w0)
  abscld(co(c4, cmin, c1), w0)
  subcld(c4, c1, w0)
  absnpncan2d(c0, c4, c2, c3, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm absnpncan3d(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(abs `(c0[-]c1))[≤]((((abs `(c0[-]c2))[+](abs `(c2[-]c3)))[+](abs `(c3[-]c4)))[+](abs `(c4[-]c1))))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ ℂ)
} = {
  letrd((abs `(c0[-]c1)), ((((abs `(c0[-]c2))[+](abs `(c2[-]c3)))[+](abs `(c3[-]c4)))[+](abs `(c4[-]c1))), ((abs `(c0[-]c4))[+](abs `(c4[-]c1))), w0)
  abscld((c0[-]c1), w0)
  subcld(c0, c1, w0)
  readdcld((abs `(c0[-]c4)), (abs `(c4[-]c1)), w0)
  readdcld((((abs `(c0[-]c2))[+](abs `(c2[-]c3)))[+](abs `(c3[-]c4))), (abs `(c4[-]c1)), w0)
  abs3difd(c0, c1, c4, w0)
  leadd1dd((abs `(c0[-]c4)), (abs `(c4[-]c1)), (((abs `(c0[-]c2))[+](abs `(c2[-]c3)))[+](abs `(c3[-]c4))), w0)
  abscld((c0[-]c4), w0)
  subcld(c0, c4, w0)
  readdcld(((abs `(c0[-]c2))[+](abs `(c2[-]c3))), (abs `(c3[-]c4)), w0)
  readdcld((abs `(c0[-]c2)), (abs `(c2[-]c3)), w0)
  abscld((c0[-]c2), w0)
  subcld(c0, c2, w0)
  abscld((c2[-]c3), w0)
  subcld(c2, c3, w0)
  abscld((c3[-]c4), w0)
  subcld(c3, c4, w0)
  abscld((c4[-]c1), w0)
  subcld(c4, c1, w0)
  absnpncan2d(c0, c4, c2, c3, w0)
}

blocks.name: upbdrech2

thm upbdrech2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wral(s0, c1, wbr(c2, cle, c0))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c2, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wrex(s1, cr, wral(s0, c1, wbr(c2, cle, cv(s1)))))
  -| wceq(c0, cif(nat0, csup(cab(s2, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(s2), c2))), cr, clt), wceq(c1, emptycls)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  jca(w0, wcel(c0, cr), wral(s0, c1, wbr(c2, cle, c0)))
  syl5eqel(c0, cr, cif(nat0, csup(cab(s2, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(s2), c2))), cr, clt), wceq(c1, emptycls)), w0)
  pm2.61dan(w0, wcel(cif(nat0, csup(cab(s2, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(s2), c2))), cr, clt), wceq(c1, emptycls)), cr), wceq(c1, emptycls))
  adantl(w0, wceq(c1, emptycls), wcel(cif(nat0, csup(cab(s2, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(s2), c2))), cr, clt), wceq(c1, emptycls)), cr))
  eqeltrd(cif(nat0, csup(cab(s2, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(s2), c2))), cr, clt), wceq(c1, emptycls)), cr, nat0, wceq(c1, emptycls))
  iftrue(nat0, csup(cab(s2, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(s2), c2))), cr, clt), wceq(c1, emptycls))
  0red(wceq(c1, emptycls))
  eqeltrd(cif(nat0, csup(cab(s2, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(s2), c2))), cr, clt), wceq(c1, emptycls)), cr, csup(cab(s2, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(s2), c2))), cr, clt), wa(w0, wn(wceq(c1, emptycls))))
  iffalsed(nat0, csup(cab(s2, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(s2), c2))), cr, clt), wa(w0, wn(wceq(c1, emptycls))), wceq(c1, emptycls))
  simpld(wa(w0, wn(wceq(c1, emptycls))), wcel(csup(cab(s2, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(s2), c2))), cr, clt), cr), wral(s0, c1, wbr(c2, cle, csup(cab(s2, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(s2), c2))), cr, clt))))
  pm2.61dan(w0, wral(s0, c1, wbr(c2, cle, c0)), wceq(c1, emptycls))
  adantl(w0, wceq(c1, emptycls), wral(s0, c1, wbr(c2, cle, c0)))
  rzal(s0, c1, wbr(c2, cle, c0))
  mpbird(wa(w0, wn(wceq(c1, emptycls))), wral(s0, c1, wbr(c2, cle, c0)), wral(s0, c1, wbr(c2, cle, csup(cab(s2, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(s2), c2))), cr, clt))))
  simprd(wa(w0, wn(wceq(c1, emptycls))), wral(s0, c1, wbr(c2, cle, csup(cab(s2, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(s2), c2))), cr, clt))), wcel(csup(cab(s2, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(s2), c2))), cr, clt), cr))
  upbdrech(s0, s1, s2, csup(cab(s2, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(s2), c2))), cr, clt), c1, c2, wa(w0, wn(wceq(c1, emptycls))))
  neqned(c1, emptycls, wa(w0, wn(wceq(c1, emptycls))))
  simpr(w0, wn(wceq(c1, emptycls)))
  adantlr(w0, wn(wceq(c1, emptycls)), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c2, cr))
  adantr(w0, wn(wceq(c1, emptycls)), wrex(s1, cr, wral(s0, c1, wbr(c2, cle, cv(s1)))))
  eqid(csup(cab(s2, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(s2), c2))), cr, clt))
  adantl(w0, wn(wceq(c1, emptycls)), wb(wral(s0, c1, wbr(c2, cle, c0)), wral(s0, c1, wbr(c2, cle, csup(cab(s2, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(s2), c2))), cr, clt)))))
  ralbidv(s0, c1, wn(wceq(c1, emptycls)), wbr(c2, cle, c0), wbr(c2, cle, csup(cab(s2, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(s2), c2))), cr, clt)))
  breq2d(c2, cle, c0, csup(cab(s2, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(s2), c2))), cr, clt), wn(wceq(c1, emptycls)))
  syl5eq(c0, csup(cab(s2, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(s2), c2))), cr, clt), cif(nat0, csup(cab(s2, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(s2), c2))), cr, clt), wceq(c1, emptycls)), wn(wceq(c1, emptycls)))
  iffalse(nat0, csup(cab(s2, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(s2), c2))), cr, clt), wceq(c1, emptycls))

  diff.emptycls.s(s1)
  diff.wn.s(s0, wceq(c1, emptycls))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c1, emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)

blocks.name: ssfiunibd
blocks.content: A finite union of bounded sets is bounded. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm ssfiunibd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {

  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, cuni(c2)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)

  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
  -| diffsw(s3, w0)
} = {
  mpd(w0, wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0)))), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s2, c2, wbr(cif(nat0, csup(cab(hs0, wrex(s1, cv(s2), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))), cr, clt), wceq(cv(s2), emptycls)), cle, cv(s0)))))
  syl2anc(w0, wrex(s0, cr, wral(s2, c2, wbr(cif(nat0, csup(cab(hs0, wrex(s1, cv(s2), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))), cr, clt), wceq(cv(s2), emptycls)), cle, cv(s0)))), wcel(c2, cfn), wral(s2, c2, wcel(cif(nat0, csup(cab(hs0, wrex(s1, cv(s2), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))), cr, clt), wceq(cv(s2), emptycls)), cr)))
  ralrimiva(s2, c2, w0, wcel(cif(nat0, csup(cab(hs0, wrex(s1, cv(s2), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))), cr, clt), wceq(cv(s2), emptycls)), cr))
  fimaxre3(s2, s0, c2, cif(nat0, csup(cab(hs0, wrex(s1, cv(s2), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))), cr, clt), wceq(cv(s2), emptycls)))
  reximdva(s0, cr, w0, wral(s2, c2, wbr(cif(nat0, csup(cab(hs0, wrex(s1, cv(s2), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))), cr, clt), wceq(cv(s2), emptycls)), cle, cv(s0))), wral(s1, c0, wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0))))
  ex(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr)), wral(s2, c2, wbr(cif(nat0, csup(cab(hs0, wrex(s1, cv(s2), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))), cr, clt), wceq(cv(s2), emptycls)), cle, cv(s0))), wral(s1, c0, wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0))))
  ralrimi(s1, c0, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr)), wral(s2, c2, wbr(cif(nat0, csup(cab(hs0, wrex(s1, cv(s2), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))), cr, clt), wceq(cv(s2), emptycls)), cle, cv(s0)))), wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0)))
  nfan(s1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr)), wral(s2, c2, wbr(cif(nat0, csup(cab(hs0, wrex(s1, cv(s2), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))), cr, clt), wceq(cv(s2), emptycls)), cle, cv(s0))))
  nfv(s1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr)))
  nfral(s1, s2, c2, wbr(cif(nat0, csup(cab(hs0, wrex(s1, cv(s2), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))), cr, clt), wceq(cv(s2), emptycls)), cle, cv(s0)))
  nfcv(s1, c2)
  nfbr(s1, cif(nat0, csup(cab(hs0, wrex(s1, cv(s2), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))), cr, clt), wceq(cv(s2), emptycls)), cle, cv(s0))
  nfif(s1, nat0, csup(cab(hs0, wrex(s1, cv(s2), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))), cr, clt), wceq(cv(s2), emptycls))

blocks.name: divcan8d
blocks.content: A cancellation law for division. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm divcan8d(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cdiv, co(c1, cmul, c0)), co(nat1, cdiv, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c1, nat0))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c0, nat0))
} = {
  3eqtrd(co(c0, cdiv, co(c1, cmul, c0)), co(nat1, cdiv, c1), co(co(c0, cdiv, c0), cdiv, co(co(c1, cmul, c0), cdiv, c0)), co(nat1, cdiv, c1), w0)
  eqcomd(co(c0, cdiv, co(c1, cmul, c0)), co(co(c0, cdiv, c0), cdiv, co(co(c1, cmul, c0), cdiv, c0)), w0)
  divcan7d(c0, c0, co(c1, cmul, c0), w0)
  mulcld(c1, c0, w0)

  divcan4d(c1, c0, w0)
  eqidd(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), w0)
}

blocks.name: dmmcand

blocks.name: leadd12dd
blocks.content: Addition to both sides of 'less than or equal to'. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm leadd12dd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), cle, co(c2, caddc, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c1, cle, c3))
} = {
  letrd(co(c0, caddc, c1), co(c2, caddc, c3), co(c2, caddc, c1), w0)
  readdcld(c0, c1, w0)
  readdcld(c2, c1, w0)
  readdcld(c2, c3, w0)
  leadd1dd(c0, c1, c2, w0)
  leadd2dd(c2, c1, c3, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm leadd12dd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[+]c1)[≤](c2[+]c3))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0[≤]c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1[≤]c3)
} = {
  letrd((c0[+]c1), (c2[+]c3), (c2[+]c1), w0)
  readdcld(c0, c1, w0)
  readdcld(c2, c1, w0)
  readdcld(c2, c3, w0)
  leadd1dd(c0, c1, c2, w0)
  leadd2dd(c2, c1, c3, w0)
}

blocks.name: xleadd2d
blocks.content: Addition of extended reals preserves the "less than or equal to" relation, in the right slot. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)

blocks.name: suprltrp
blocks.content: The supremum of a nonempty bounded set of reals can be approximated from below by elements of the set. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm suprltrp(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wbr(co(csup(c0, cr, clt), cmin, c1), clt, cv(s0))))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c0, emptycls))
  -| wi(w0, wrex(s1, cr, wral(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), cle, cv(s1)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, crp))
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)

blocks.name: xleadd1d
blocks.content: Addition of extended reals preserves the "less than or equal to" relation, in the left slot. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)

blocks.name: xreqled
blocks.content: Equality implies 'less than or equal to'. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)

blocks.name: xrgepnfd
blocks.content: An extended real greater than or equal to ` +oo ` is ` +oo ` (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)

blocks.name: xrge0nemnfd
blocks.content: A nonnegative extended real is not minus infinity. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)

blocks.name: iuneqfzuzlem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ iuneqfzuz : here, inclusion is proven; aiuneqfzuz uses this lemma twice, to prove equality. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)

blocks.name: iuneqfzuz
blocks.content: If two unions indexed by upper integers are equal if they agree on any partial indexed union. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm iuneqfzuz(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wral(s0, c0, wceq(ciun(s1, co(c1, cfz, cv(s0)), c2), ciun(s1, co(c1, cfz, cv(s0)), c3))), wceq(ciun(s1, c0, c2), ciun(s1, c0, c3)))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cuz, c1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {

blocks.name: xle2addd
blocks.content: Adding both side of two inequalities. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm xle2addd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(co(c0, cxad, c1), cle, co(c2, cxad, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cxr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cxr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cxr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cxr))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c1, cle, c3))
} = {
  xrletrd(co(c0, cxad, c1), co(c2, cxad, c3), co(c0, cxad, c3), w0)
  xaddcld(c0, c1, w0)
  xaddcld(c0, c3, w0)
  xaddcld(c2, c3, w0)
  xleadd2d(c0, c1, c3, w0)
  xleadd1d(c0, c3, c2, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm xle2addd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[+]c1)[≤](c2[+]c3))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ ℝ*)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ ℝ*)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℝ*)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ ℝ*)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0[≤]c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1[≤]c3)
} = {
  xrletrd((c0[+]c1), (c2[+]c3), (c0[+]c3), w0)
  xaddcld(c0, c1, w0)
  xaddcld(c0, c3, w0)
  xaddcld(c2, c3, w0)
  xleadd2d(c0, c1, c3, w0)
  xleadd1d(c0, c3, c2, w0)
}

blocks.name: supxrge
blocks.content: If an extended real number can be approximated from below by members of a set, then it is less than or equal to the supremum of the set. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: suplesup
blocks.content: If any element of ` A ` can be approximated from below by members of ` B ` , then the supremum of ` A ` is less than or equal to the supremum of ` B ` . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm suplesup(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(csup(c0, cxr, clt), cle, csup(c1, cxr, clt)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c1, cxr))
  -| wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, crp, wrex(s2, c1, wbr(co(cv(s0), cmin, cv(s1)), clt, cv(s2))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  pm2.61dan(w0, wbr(csup(c0, cxr, clt), cle, csup(c1, cxr, clt)), wceq(csup(c0, cxr, clt), cpnf))
  xreqled(csup(c0, cxr, clt), csup(c1, cxr, clt), wa(w0, wceq(csup(c0, cxr, clt), cpnf)))
  adantr(w0, wceq(csup(c0, cxr, clt), cpnf), wcel(csup(c0, cxr, clt), cxr))
  3eqtr4d(csup(c0, cxr, clt), csup(c1, cxr, clt), cpnf, cpnf, wa(w0, wceq(csup(c0, cxr, clt), cpnf)))
  eqidd(cpnf, wa(w0, wceq(csup(c0, cxr, clt), cpnf)))
  mpbid(wa(w0, wceq(csup(c0, cxr, clt), cpnf)), wceq(csup(c1, cxr, clt), cpnf), wral(hs0, cr, wrex(s2, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s2)))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, cr, wa(w0, wceq(csup(c0, cxr, clt), cpnf)), wrex(s2, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s2))))
  mpd(wa(wa(w0, wceq(csup(c0, cxr, clt), cpnf)), wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wrex(s2, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s2))), wrex(s2, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(s2))))
  mpd(wa(wa(w0, wceq(csup(c0, cxr, clt), cpnf)), wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wrex(s2, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(s2))), wrex(s0, c0, wbr(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), clt, cv(s0))))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(w0, wceq(csup(c0, cxr, clt), cpnf)), wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wrex(s0, c0, wbr(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), clt, cv(s0))), wcel(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), cr), wral(hs1, cr, wrex(s0, c0, wbr(cv(hs1), clt, cv(s0)))))
  adantl(wa(w0, wceq(csup(c0, cxr, clt), cpnf)), wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), cr))
  peano2re(cv(hs0))
  adantr(wa(w0, wceq(csup(c0, cxr, clt), cpnf)), wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wral(hs1, cr, wrex(s0, c0, wbr(cv(hs1), clt, cv(s0)))))
  mpbird(wa(w0, wceq(csup(c0, cxr, clt), cpnf)), wral(hs1, cr, wrex(s0, c0, wbr(cv(hs1), clt, cv(s0)))), wceq(csup(c0, cxr, clt), cpnf))
  simpr(w0, wceq(csup(c0, cxr, clt), cpnf))
  syl(wa(w0, wceq(csup(c0, cxr, clt), cpnf)), wb(wral(hs1, cr, wrex(s0, c0, wbr(cv(hs1), clt, cv(s0)))), wceq(csup(c0, cxr, clt), cpnf)), wss(c0, cxr))

blocks.name: infxrglb
blocks.content: The infimum of a set of extended reals is less than an extended real if and only if the set contains a smaller number. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Oct-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm infxrglb(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wss(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wb(wbr(cinf(c0, cxr, clt), clt, c1), wrex(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  infglbb(s0, hs0, hs1, c1, cxr, c0, clt, wss(c0, cxr))
  a1i(wss(c0, cxr), wor(clt, cxr))
  xrltso()
  xrinfmss(hs0, hs1, s0, c0)
  id(wss(c0, cxr))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.clt.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(cxr)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(clt)
  diff.hs1.c(cxr)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)

blocks.name: xrlexaddrp
blocks.content: If an extended real number ` A ` can be approximated from above, adding positive reals to ` B ` , then ` A ` is less than or equal to ` B ` . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Oct-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm xrlexaddrp(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {

  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)

  pm2.61dan(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1), wceq(c1, cpnf))

  pm2.53(wcel(c1, cr), wceq(c1, cmnf))
  neneqd(c1, cmnf, wa(wa(wa(w0, wne(c1, cpnf)), wne(c0, cmnf)), wn(wcel(c1, cr))))

  eqbrtrd(co(c1, cxad, nat1), clt, c0, cmnf, wa(wa(w0, wne(c0, cmnf)), wceq(c1, cmnf)))
  eqcomd(co(c1, cxad, nat1), cmnf, wa(wa(w0, wne(c0, cmnf)), wceq(c1, cmnf)))
  adantl(wa(w0, wne(c0, cmnf)), wceq(c1, cmnf), wceq(cmnf, co(c1, cxad, nat1)))
  eqtr2d(cmnf, co(c1, cxad, nat1), co(cmnf, cxad, nat1), wceq(c1, cmnf))
  oveq1(c1, cmnf, cxad, nat1)

  adantr(wa(w0, wne(c0, cmnf)), wceq(c1, cmnf), wbr(cmnf, clt, c0))

  adantr(w0, wne(c0, cmnf), wcel(c0, cxr))
  simpr(w0, wne(c0, cmnf))

  syl2anc(wa(wa(w0, wne(c0, cmnf)), wceq(c1, cmnf)), wb(wbr(co(c1, cxad, nat1), clt, c0), wn(wbr(c0, cle, co(c1, cxad, nat1)))), wcel(co(c1, cxad, nat1), cxr), wcel(c0, cxr))

  ad2antrr(w0, wne(c0, cmnf), wceq(c1, cmnf), wcel(c0, cxr))
  xrltnle(co(c1, cxad, nat1), c0)
  mpbird(wa(w0, wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wral(s0, crp, wbr(c0, cle, co(c1, caddc, cv(s0)))))
  ralrimiva(s0, crp, wa(w0, wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(c0, cle, co(c1, caddc, cv(s0))))
  breqtrd(c0, cle, co(c1, caddc, cv(s0)), co(c1, cxad, cv(s0)), wa(wa(w0, wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(cv(s0), crp)))
  adantlr(w0, wcel(c1, cr), wcel(cv(s0), crp), wbr(c0, cle, co(c1, cxad, cv(s0))))

blocks.name: supsubc
blocks.content: The supremum function distributes over subtraction in a sense similar to that in ~ supaddc . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 21-Nov-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm supsubc(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(csup(c0, cr, clt), cmin, c1), csup(c2, cr, clt)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c0, emptycls))
  -| wi(w0, wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
  -| wceq(c2, cab(s2, wrex(s3, c0, wceq(cv(s2), co(cv(s3), cmin, c1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
  -| diffsw(s3, w0)
} = {
  3eqtrrd(co(csup(c0, cr, clt), cmin, c1), csup(c2, cr, clt), csup(cab(s2, wrex(s3, c0, wceq(cv(s2), co(cv(s3), caddc, cneg(c1))))), cr, clt), co(csup(c0, cr, clt), caddc, cneg(c1)), w0)
  supeq1d(c2, cr, clt, cab(s2, wrex(s3, c0, wceq(cv(s2), co(cv(s3), caddc, cneg(c1))))), w0)
  3eqtrd(c2, cab(s2, wrex(s3, c0, wceq(cv(s2), co(cv(s3), caddc, cneg(c1))))), cab(s2, wrex(s3, c0, wceq(cv(s2), co(cv(s3), cmin, c1)))), cab(s2, wrex(s3, c0, wceq(cv(s2), co(cv(s3), caddc, cneg(c1))))), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(c2, cab(s2, wrex(s3, c0, wceq(cv(s2), co(cv(s3), cmin, c1))))))
  abbidv(s2, w0, wrex(s3, c0, wceq(cv(s2), co(cv(s3), cmin, c1))), wrex(s3, c0, wceq(cv(s2), co(cv(s3), caddc, cneg(c1)))))
  rexbidva(s3, c0, w0, wceq(cv(s2), co(cv(s3), cmin, c1)), wceq(cv(s2), co(cv(s3), caddc, cneg(c1))))
  eqeq2d(cv(s2), co(cv(s3), cmin, c1), co(cv(s3), caddc, cneg(c1)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s3), c0)))
  eqcomd(co(cv(s3), cmin, c1), co(cv(s3), caddc, cneg(c1)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s3), c0)))

thm supsubc(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(sup(c0, ℝ, <)[-]c1)= sup(c2, ℝ, <))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ⊆ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ≠ ∅)
  ⊣ (w0 → ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, s1[≤]s0)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ c2 = { s2 | ∃(s3 ∈ c0, s2 =(s3[-]c1))}
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s3, c0)
  ⊣ d(s3, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
  ⊣ d(s3, w0)
} = {
  3eqtrrd((sup(c0, ℝ, <)[-]c1), sup(c2, ℝ, <), sup({ s2 | ∃(s3 ∈ c0, s2 =(s3[+]-u(c1)))}, ℝ, <), (sup(c0, ℝ, <)[+]-u(c1)), w0)
  supeq1d(c2, cr, clt, { s2 | ∃(s3 ∈ c0, s2 =(s3[+]-u(c1)))}, w0)
  3eqtrd(c2, { s2 | ∃(s3 ∈ c0, s2 =(s3[+]-u(c1)))}, { s2 | ∃(s3 ∈ c0, s2 =(s3[-]c1))}, { s2 | ∃(s3 ∈ c0, s2 =(s3[+]-u(c1)))}, w0)
  a1i(w0, c2 = { s2 | ∃(s3 ∈ c0, s2 =(s3[-]c1))})
  abbidv(s2, w0, ∃(s3 ∈ c0, s2 =(s3[-]c1)), ∃(s3 ∈ c0, s2 =(s3[+]-u(c1))))
  rexbidva(s3, c0, w0, s2 =(s3[-]c1), s2 =(s3[+]-u(c1)))
  eqeq2d(s2, (s3[-]c1), (s3[+]-u(c1)), (w0 ∧ s3 ∈ c0))
  eqcomd((s3[-]c1), (s3[+]-u(c1)), (w0 ∧ s3 ∈ c0))
  negsubd(s3, c1, (w0 ∧ s3 ∈ c0))
  recnd(s3, (w0 ∧ s3 ∈ c0))
  sselda(s3, c0, cr, w0)
  adantr(w0, s3 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ ℂ)
  eqidd({ s2 | ∃(s3 ∈ c0, s2 =(s3[+]-u(c1)))}, w0)
  eqcomd(sup({ s2 | ∃(s3 ∈ c0, s2 =(s3[+]-u(c1)))}, ℝ, <), (sup(c0, ℝ, <)[+]-u(c1)), w0)
  supaddc(s0, s1, s2, s3, c0, -u(c1), { s2 | ∃(s3 ∈ c0, s2 =(s3[+]-u(c1)))}, w0)
  renegcld(c1, w0)
  eqid({ s2 | ∃(s3 ∈ c0, s2 =(s3[+]-u(c1)))})
  negsubd(sup(c0, ℝ, <), c1, w0)
  recnd(sup(c0, ℝ, <), w0)
  syl3anc(w0, sup(c0, ℝ, <)∈ ℝ, c0 ⊆ ℝ, c0 ≠ ∅, ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, s1[≤]s0)))
  suprcl(s0, s1, c0)
  recnd(c1, w0)
  diff.cab.s(s0, s2, ∃(s3 ∈ c0, s2 =(s3[+]-u(c1))))
  diff.wrex.s(s0, s3, c0, s2 =(s3[+]-u(c1)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, s2, (s3[+]-u(c1)))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.co.s(s0, s3, caddc, -u(c1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s3)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.cneg.s(s0, c1)
  diff.cneg.s(s1, c1)
  diff.cneg.s(s2, c1)
  diff.cneg.s(s3, c1)
}

blocks.name: nnuzdisj
blocks.content: The first ` N ` elements of the set of nonnegative integers are distinct from any later members. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 21-Nov-2020.)

blocks.name: ltdivgt1
blocks.content: Divsion by a number greater than 1. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 21-Nov-2020.)

blocks.name: xrltned
blocks.content: 'Less than' implies not equal. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 21-Nov-2020.)

blocks.name: nnsplit
blocks.content: Express the set of positive integers as the disjoint (see ~ nnuzdisj ) union of the first ` N ` values and the rest. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 21-Nov-2020.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: divdiv3d

blocks.name: qenom
blocks.content: The set of rational numbers is equinumerous to omega (the set of finite ordinal numbers). (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 24-Dec-2020.)

blocks.name: qct
blocks.content: The set of rational numbers is countable. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 24-Dec-2020.)

blocks.name: xrltnled
blocks.content: 'Less than' in terms of 'less than or equal to'. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Mar-2021.)

blocks.name: lenlteq
blocks.content: 'less than or equal to' but not 'less than' implies 'equal' . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Mar-2021.)

blocks.name: xrred
blocks.content: An extended real that is neither minus infinity, nor plus infinity, is real. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Mar-2021.)

blocks.name: infxrunb2
blocks.content: The infimum of an unbounded-below set of extended reals is minus infinity. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Mar-2021.)

blocks.name: infleinf
blocks.content: If any element of ` B ` can be approximated from above by members of ` A ` , then the infimum of ` A ` is less than or equal to the infimum of ` B ` . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Mar-2021.)
blocks.origin:

thm suplesup2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sup(c0, ℝ*, <)[≤]sup(c1, ℝ*, <))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ⊆ ℝ*)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ⊆ ℝ*)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ ∃(s1 ∈ c1, s0[≤]s1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {

  rexlimdv(s1, c1, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), s0[≤]s1, s0[≤]sup(c1, ℝ*, <))
  3exp((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), s1 ∈ c1, s0[≤]s1, s0[≤]sup(c1, ℝ*, <))
  xrletrd(s0, sup(c1, ℝ*, <), s1, ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)∧ s1 ∈ c1 ∧ s0[≤]s1))
  3ad2ant1((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), s1 ∈ c1, s0[≤]s1, s0 ∈ ℝ*)
  sselda(s0, c0, cxr, w0)
  syl2anc(((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)∧ s1 ∈ c1 ∧ s0[≤]s1), s1 ∈ ℝ*, w0, s1 ∈ c1)
  sselda(s1, c1, cxr, w0)
  syl(((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)∧ s1 ∈ c1 ∧ s0[≤]s1), sup(c1, ℝ*, <)∈ ℝ*, w0)
  simp3((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), s1 ∈ c1, s0[≤]s1)
  syl2anc(((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)∧ s1 ∈ c1 ∧ s0[≤]s1), s1[≤]sup(c1, ℝ*, <), w0, s1 ∈ c1)
  simp1l(w0, s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1, s0[≤]s1)
  simp2((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), s1 ∈ c1, s0[≤]s1)
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1), s1[≤]sup(c1, ℝ*, <), c1 ⊆ ℝ*, s1 ∈ c1)
  adantr(w0, s1 ∈ c1, c1 ⊆ ℝ*)
  simpr(w0, s1 ∈ c1)
  supxrub(c1, s1)
  syl2anc(w0, (sup(c0, ℝ*, <)[≤]sup(c1, ℝ*, <)↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, s0[≤]sup(c1, ℝ*, <))), c0 ⊆ ℝ*, sup(c1, ℝ*, <)∈ ℝ*)
  syl(w0, sup(c1, ℝ*, <)∈ ℝ*, c1 ⊆ ℝ*)
  supxrcl(c1)
  supxrleub(s0, c0, sup(c1, ℝ*, <))
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, s0 ∈ c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, c0)
  diff.wbr.s(s1, s0, cle, sup(c1, ℝ*, <))

blocks.name: allbutfi
blocks.content: For all but finitely many. Some authors say "cofinitely many". Some authors say "ultimately". Compare with ~ eliuniin and ~ eliuniin2 (here, the precondition can be dropped; see ~ eliuniincex ). (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)

thm allbutfi(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

  -| wceq(c1, ciun(s0, c2, ciin(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), c3)))

  nfel(s0, c0, c1)
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  nfcxfr(s0, c1, ciun(s0, c2, ciin(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), c3)))

  a1d(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wi(wcel(c0, ciin(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), c3)), wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), wcel(c0, c3))))
  biimpd(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, ciin(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), c3)), wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), wcel(c0, c3)))

  sylibr(wrex(s0, c2, wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), wcel(c0, c3))), wcel(c0, ciun(s0, c2, ciin(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), c3))), wrex(s0, c2, wcel(c0, ciin(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), c3))))
  reximia(s0, c2, wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), wcel(c0, c3)), wcel(c0, ciin(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), c3)))

blocks.origin:
thm ltdiv23neg(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {

  -| wi(w0, wbr(c1, clt, nat0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c2, clt, nat0))
} = {
  3bitrd(w0, wbr(co(c0, cdiv, c1), clt, c2), wbr(co(c0, cdiv, c2), clt, c1), wbr(co(c2, cmul, c1), clt, co(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cmul, c1)), wbr(co(c2, cmul, c1), clt, c0))
  ltmulneg(co(c0, cdiv, c1), c2, c1, w0)
  redivcld(c0, c1, w0)
  breq2d(co(c2, cmul, c1), clt, co(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cmul, c1), c0, w0)

thm fimaxre4(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0)))))
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(c1, cr))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  syl2anc(w0, wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0)))), wcel(c0, cfn), wral(s1, c0, wcel(c1, cr)))
  ralrimi(s1, c0, w0, wcel(c1, cr))
  ex(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(c1, cr))
  fimaxre3(s1, s0, c0, c1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

thm fimaxre4(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, c1[≤]s0)))
  ⊣ F/(s1, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  syl2anc(w0, ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, c1[≤]s0)), c0 ∈ Fin, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ ℝ))
  ralrimi(s1, c0, w0, c1 ∈ ℝ)
  ex(w0, s1 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ ℝ)
  fimaxre3(s1, s0, c0, c1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

thm supxrleubrnmpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(sup(ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), ℝ*, <)[≤]c2 ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1[≤]c2)))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℝ*)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℝ*)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  bitrd(w0, sup(ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), ℝ*, <)[≤]c2, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1[≤]c2), ∀(hs0 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), hs0[≤]c2))
  syl2anc(w0, (sup(ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), ℝ*, <)[≤]c2 ↔ ∀(hs0 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), hs0[≤]c2)), ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))⊆ ℝ*, c2 ∈ ℝ*)
  rnmptssd(s0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), cxr, c0, c1, w0)
  supxrleub(hs0, ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), c2)
  impbid(w0, ∀(hs0 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), hs0[≤]c2), ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1[≤]c2))
  ex(w0, ∀(hs0 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), hs0[≤]c2), ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1[≤]c2))
  ralrimi(s0, c0, (w0 ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), hs0[≤]c2)), c1[≤]c2)
  nfan(s0, w0, ∀(hs0 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), hs0[≤]c2))
  nfral(s0, hs0, ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), hs0[≤]c2)
  nfrn(s0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))
  nfmpt1(s0, c0, c1)
  ex((w0 ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), hs0[≤]c2)), s0 ∈ c0, c1[≤]c2)
  syl2anc(((w0 ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), hs0[≤]c2))∧ s0 ∈ c0), c1[≤]c2, c1 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), ∀(hs0 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), hs0[≤]c2))
  adantlr(w0, ∀(hs0 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), hs0[≤]c2), s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)))
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), c1 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ ℝ*)
  simpr(w0, s0 ∈ c0)
  elrnmpt1(s0, c0, c1, cxr, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))
  simplr(w0, ∀(hs0 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), hs0[≤]c2), s0 ∈ c0)
  rspcva(hs0, c1, ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), hs0[≤]c2, c1[≤]c2)
  a1i(w0, (∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1[≤]c2)→ ∀(hs0 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), hs0[≤]c2)))
  ralrimiva(hs0, ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1[≤]c2), hs0[≤]c2)
  mpd((∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1[≤]c2)∧ hs0 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))), hs0[≤]c2, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 = c1))
  adantl(∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1[≤]c2), hs0 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), ∃(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 = c1))
  biimpi(hs0 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), ∃(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 = c1))
  ax-mp((hs0 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))↔ ∃(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 = c1)), hs0 ∈ 𝕌)
  vex(hs0)
  elrnmpt(s0, hs0, universe, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), c0, c1)
  eqid((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))
  adantr(∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1[≤]c2), hs0 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), (∃(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 = c1)→ hs0[≤]c2))
  rexlimd(s0, c0, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1[≤]c2), hs0 = c1, hs0[≤]c2)
  nfra1(s0, c0, c1[≤]c2)
  nfv(s0, hs0[≤]c2)
  ex(∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1[≤]c2), s0 ∈ c0, (hs0 = c1 → hs0[≤]c2))
  syl((∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1[≤]c2)∧ s0 ∈ c0), (hs0 = c1 → hs0[≤]c2), c1[≤]c2)
  rspa(s0, c0, c1[≤]c2)
  biimprcd(c1[≤]c2, hs0 = c1, hs0[≤]c2)
  breq1(hs0, c1, cle, c2)
  diff.cxr.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, hs0, cle, c2)
  diff.cle.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(c1[≤]c2)
  diff.hs0.w(∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1[≤]c2))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm infxrlbrnmpt2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cinf(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cxr, clt), cle, c2))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cxr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cxr))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c3), wceq(c1, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  syl2anc(w0, wbr(cinf(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cxr, clt), cle, c2), wss(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cxr), wcel(c2, crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))))
  rnmptssd(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cxr, c0, c1, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(c2, crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), wcel(c3, c0), wcel(c2, cxr))
  elrnmpt1s(s0, c3, c0, c2, cxr, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c1)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  infxrlb(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), c2)
  diff.cxr.s(s0)
}

thm infxrlbrnmpt2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → inf(ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), ℝ*, <)[≤]c2)
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℝ*)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c0)

  syl2anc(w0, inf(ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), ℝ*, <)[≤]c2, ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))⊆ ℝ*, c2 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)))
  rnmptssd(s0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), cxr, c0, c1, w0)

  elrnmpt1s(s0, c3, c0, c2, cxr, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), c1)
  eqid((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))
  infxrlb(ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), c2)

blocks.name: rexabslelem

blocks.name: rexabsle
blocks.content: An indexed set of absolute values of real numbers is bounded if and only if the original values are bounded above and below. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm rexabsle(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cfv(cabs, c1), cle, cv(s0)))), wa(wrex(s2, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(c1, cle, cv(s2)))), wrex(s3, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s3), cle, c1))))))
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(c1, cr))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
} = {
  3bitrd(w0, wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cfv(cabs, c1), cle, cv(s0)))), wa(wrex(s2, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(c1, cle, cv(s2)))), wrex(s3, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s3), cle, c1)))), wrex(hs0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cfv(cabs, c1), cle, cv(hs0)))), wa(wrex(hs1, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs1)))), wrex(hs2, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(hs2), cle, c1)))))
  a1i(w0, wb(wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cfv(cabs, c1), cle, cv(s0)))), wrex(hs0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cfv(cabs, c1), cle, cv(hs0))))))

thm rexabsle(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(abs ` c1)[≤]s0))↔(∃(s2 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, c1[≤]s2))∧ ∃(s3 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, s3[≤]c1)))))

} = {

  a1i(w0, ((∃(hs1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, c1[≤]hs1))∧ ∃(hs2 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, hs2[≤]c1)))↔(∃(s2 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, c1[≤]s2))∧ ∃(s3 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, s3[≤]c1)))))
  anbi12i(∃(hs1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, c1[≤]hs1)), ∃(hs2 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, hs2[≤]c1)), ∃(s2 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, c1[≤]s2)), ∃(s3 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, s3[≤]c1)))
  cbvrexv(hs1, s2, cr, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, c1[≤]hs1), ∀(s1 ∈ c0, c1[≤]s2))
  ralbidv(s1, c0, hs1 = s2, c1[≤]hs1, c1[≤]s2)

  ralbidv(s1, c0, hs2 = s3, hs2[≤]c1, s3[≤]c1)
  breq1(hs2, s3, cle, c1)
  diff.cr.s(s0)

  sylib(w0, wrex(s1, c1, wral(s0, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wcel(c2, c3))), wcel(c2, c5))

  rexlimi(s1, c1, wral(s0, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wcel(c2, c3)), wne(crab(s1, c1, wral(s0, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wcel(c2, c3))), emptycls))

blocks.name: supxrrernmpt
blocks.content: The real and extended real indexed suprema match when the indexed real supremum exists. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm supxrrernmpt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csup(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cxr, clt), csup(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cr, clt)))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wne(c0, emptycls))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wrex(s1, cr, wral(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  syl3anc(w0, wceq(csup(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cxr, clt), csup(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cr, clt)), wss(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cr), wne(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), emptycls), wrex(s1, cr, wral(hs0, crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s1)))))
  rnmptssd(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cr, c0, c1, w0)
  rnmptn0(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, c1, cr, w0)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  rnmptbdd(s1, hs0, s0, c0, c1, w0)
  supxrre(s1, hs0, crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)))
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.crn.s(s1, cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  diff.cmpt.s(s1, s0, c0, c1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.hs0.c(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)))
}

thm supxrrernmpt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sup(ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), ℝ*, <)= sup(ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), ℝ, <))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ≠ ∅)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → ∃(s1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1[≤]s1)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {

  rnmptssd(s0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), cr, c0, c1, w0)
  rnmptn0(s0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), c0, c1, cr, w0)
  eqid((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))
  rnmptbdd(s1, hs0, s0, c0, c1, w0)

}

blocks.name: suprleubrnmpt

  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, cr))

  syl(wa(wral(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wi(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c2)), wbr(c1, cle, c2))

thm suprleubrnmpt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(sup(ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), ℝ, <)[≤]c2 ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1[≤]c2)))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ≠ ∅)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → ∃(s1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1[≤]s1)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  bitrd(w0, sup(ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), ℝ, <)[≤]c2, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1[≤]c2), ∀(hs0 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), hs0[≤]c2))
  syl31anc(w0, (sup(ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), ℝ, <)[≤]c2 ↔ ∀(hs0 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), hs0[≤]c2)), ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))⊆ ℝ, ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))≠ ∅, ∃(s1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs1 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), hs1[≤]s1)), c2 ∈ ℝ)
  rnmptssd(s0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), cr, c0, c1, w0)
  rnmptn0(s0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), c0, c1, cr, w0)
  rnmptbdd(s1, hs1, s0, c0, c1, w0)
  suprleub(s1, hs1, hs0, ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), c2)
  impbid(w0, ∀(hs0 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), hs0[≤]c2), ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1[≤]c2))
  ex(w0, ∀(hs0 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), hs0[≤]c2), ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1[≤]c2))
  ralrimi(s0, c0, (w0 ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), hs0[≤]c2)), c1[≤]c2)
  nfan(s0, w0, ∀(hs0 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), hs0[≤]c2))
  nfral(s0, hs0, ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), hs0[≤]c2)
  nfrn(s0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))
  nfmpt1(s0, c0, c1)
  ex((w0 ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), hs0[≤]c2)), s0 ∈ c0, c1[≤]c2)
  syl2anc(((w0 ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), hs0[≤]c2))∧ s0 ∈ c0), c1[≤]c2, c1 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), ∀(hs0 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), hs0[≤]c2))
  adantlr(w0, ∀(hs0 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), hs0[≤]c2), s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)))
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), c1 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ ℝ)
  simpr(w0, s0 ∈ c0)
  elrnmpt1(s0, c0, c1, cr, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))
  simplr(w0, ∀(hs0 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), hs0[≤]c2), s0 ∈ c0)
  rspcva(hs0, c1, ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), hs0[≤]c2, c1[≤]c2)
  a1i(w0, (∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1[≤]c2)→ ∀(hs0 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), hs0[≤]c2)))
  ralrimiva(hs0, ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1[≤]c2), hs0[≤]c2)
  mpd((∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1[≤]c2)∧ hs0 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))), hs0[≤]c2, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 = c1))
  adantl(∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1[≤]c2), hs0 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), ∃(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 = c1))

  rexlimd(s0, c0, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1[≤]c2), hs0 = c1, hs0[≤]c2)
  nfra1(s0, c0, c1[≤]c2)

  syl((∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1[≤]c2)∧ s0 ∈ c0), (hs0 = c1 → hs0[≤]c2), c1[≤]c2)

  diff.cmpt.s(s1, s0, c0, c1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.hs1.c(ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)))

  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(c1[≤]c2)
  diff.hs0.w(∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1[≤]c2))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: infrnmptle
blocks.content: An indexed infimum of extended reals is smaller than another indexed infimum of extended reals, when every indexed element is smaller than the corresponding one. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm infrnmptle(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cinf(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cxr, clt), cle, cinf(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c2)), cxr, clt)))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cxr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, cxr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wbr(c1, cle, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  infleinf2(hs0, hs1, crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c2)), w0)
  nfv(hs0, w0)
  nfv(hs1, w0)
  rnmptssd(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cxr, c0, c1, w0)
  rnmptssd(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cxr, c0, c2, w0)
  mpd(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c2)))), wrex(hs1, crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, cv(hs0))), wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c2))), wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))
  biimpi(wcel(cv(hs0), crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c2))), wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(cv(hs0), crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c2))), wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  vex(hs0)
  elrnmpt(s0, cv(hs0), universe, cmpt(s0, c0, c2), c0, c2)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c2))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c2))), wi(wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wrex(hs1, crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, cv(hs0)))))
  rexlimd(s0, c0, w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wrex(hs1, crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, cv(hs0))))
  nfrex(s0, hs1, crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, cv(hs0)))
  nfrn(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  nfmpt1(s0, c0, c1)
  nfv(s0, wbr(cv(hs1), cle, cv(hs0)))
  3exp(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wrex(hs1, crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, cv(hs0))))
  syl2anc(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wrex(hs1, crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, cv(hs0))), wcel(c1, crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs0)))
  3adant3(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(c1, crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, cxr))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  elrnmpt1(s0, c0, c1, cxr, cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  breqtrd(c1, cle, cv(hs0), c2, w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))
  3adant3(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wbr(c1, cle, c2))
  3ad2ant3(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(c2, cv(hs0)))
  eqcomd(c2, cv(hs0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  rspcev(hs1, c1, crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs1), cle, cv(hs0)))
  breq1(cv(hs1), c1, cle, cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c2)))
  diff.hs1.c(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)))
  diff.hs1.c(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c2)))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.cxr.s(s0)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, cv(hs1), cle, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.cle.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)

thm infrnmptle(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → inf(ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), ℝ*, <)[≤]inf(ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)), ℝ*, <))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℝ*)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c2 ∈ ℝ*)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1[≤]c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  infleinf2(hs0, hs1, ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)), w0)
  nfv(hs0, w0)
  nfv(hs1, w0)
  rnmptssd(s0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), cxr, c0, c1, w0)
  rnmptssd(s0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2), cxr, c0, c2, w0)
  mpd((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2))), ∃(hs1 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), hs1[≤]hs0), ∃(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 = c2))
  adantl(w0, hs0 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)), ∃(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 = c2))
  biimpi(hs0 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)), ∃(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 = c2))
  ax-mp((hs0 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2))↔ ∃(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 = c2)), hs0 ∈ 𝕌)
  vex(hs0)

thm uzublem(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, c1[≤]s0)))
  ⊣ F/(s1, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s1, c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ c0 =(ℤ≥ ` c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ c5 = sup(ran((s1 ∈(c3[...]c6)↦ c1)), ℝ, <)
  ⊣ c2 = if(c5[≤]c4, c4, c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c6 ∈ c0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → ∀(s1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c6), c1[≤]c4))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c6)
} = {
  syl2anc(w0, ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, c1[≤]s0)), c2 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, c1[≤]c2))
  ralrimi(s1, c0, w0, c1[≤]c2)
  ex(w0, s1 ∈ c0, c1[≤]c2)
  pm2.61dan((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0), c1[≤]c2, c6[≤]s1)
  letrd(c1, c2, c4, ((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0)∧ c6[≤]s1))
  adantr((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0), c6[≤]s1, c1 ∈ ℝ)
  ad2antrr(w0, s1 ∈ c0, c6[≤]s1, c4 ∈ ℝ)
  ad2antrr(w0, s1 ∈ c0, c6[≤]s1, c2 ∈ ℝ)
  syl2anc(((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0)∧ c6[≤]s1), c1[≤]c4, ∀(s1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c6), c1[≤]c4), s1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c6))
  ad2antrr(w0, s1 ∈ c0, c6[≤]s1, ∀(s1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c6), c1[≤]c4))
  eluzd(s1, (ℤ≥ ` c6), c6, ((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0)∧ c6[≤]s1))
  eqid((ℤ≥ ` c6))

  ad2antlr(w0, s1 ∈ c0, c6[≤]s1, s1 ∈ ℤ)
  simpr((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0), c6[≤]s1)
  rspa(s1, (ℤ≥ ` c6), c1[≤]c4)
  ad2antrr(w0, s1 ∈ c0, c6[≤]s1, c4[≤]c2)
  syl6breqr(c4, cle, c2, if(c5[≤]c4, c4, c5), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, c4[≤]if(c5[≤]c4, c4, c5), c5 ∈ ℝ, c4 ∈ ℝ)
  max2(c5, c4)
  syldan((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0), ¬ c6[≤]s1, c1[≤]c2, s1[<]c6)
  mpbird(((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0)∧ ¬ c6[≤]s1), s1[<]c6, ¬ c6[≤]s1)
  simpr((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0), ¬ c6[≤]s1)
  ltnled(s1, c6, ((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0)∧ ¬ c6[≤]s1))
  ad2antlr(w0, s1 ∈ c0, ¬ c6[≤]s1, s1 ∈ ℝ)
  ad2antrr(w0, s1 ∈ c0, ¬ c6[≤]s1, c6 ∈ ℝ)
  letrd(c1, c2, c5, ((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0)∧ s1[<]c6))
  adantr((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0), s1[<]c6, c1 ∈ ℝ)
  ad2antrr(w0, s1 ∈ c0, s1[<]c6, c5 ∈ ℝ)
  ad2antrr(w0, s1 ∈ c0, s1[<]c6, c2 ∈ ℝ)
  syl5eqel(c2, cr, if(c5[≤]c4, c4, c5), w0)
  ifcld(c4, c5, cr, w0, c5[≤]c4)
  syl5eqel(c5, cr, sup(ran((s1 ∈(c3[...]c6)↦ c1)), ℝ, <), w0)
  syl5eqelr(sup(ran((s1 ∈(c3[...]c6)↦ c1)), ℝ, <), cr, c5, w0)
  syl6breqr(c1, cle, c5, sup(ran((s1 ∈(c3[...]c6)↦ c1)), ℝ, <), ((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0)∧ s1[<]c6))
  syl2anc(((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0)∧ s1[<]c6), c1[≤]sup(ran((s1 ∈(c3[...]c6)↦ c1)), ℝ, <), w0, s1 ∈(c3[...]c6))
  simpll(w0, s1 ∈ c0, s1[<]c6)
  elfzd(s1, c3, c6, ((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0)∧ s1[<]c6))
  ad2antrr(w0, s1 ∈ c0, s1[<]c6, c3 ∈ ℤ)
  3syl(((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0)∧ s1[<]c6), s1 ∈ ℤ, s1 ∈(c3[..^]c6), s1 ∈ c0)

  eluzle(s1, c3)

  3syl(((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0)∧ s1[<]c6), s1 ∈ ℝ, s1 ∈(c3[..^]c6), s1 ∈ c0)
  elfzod(s1, c3, c6, ((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0)∧ s1[<]c6))
  ad2antlr(w0, s1 ∈ c0, s1[<]c6, s1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c3))
  biimpi(s1 ∈ c0, s1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c3))
  eleq2i(s1, c0, (ℤ≥ ` c3))
  ad2antrr(w0, s1 ∈ c0, s1[<]c6, c6 ∈ ℤ)
  syl6eleq(s1, c0, (ℤ≥ ` c3), s1 ∈(c3[..^]c6))
  elfzouz(s1, c3, c6)
  sseli(s1, c0, cr)
  ad2antrr(w0, s1 ∈ c0, s1[<]c6, c6 ∈ ℝ)
  sseldi(c6, cr, c0, w0)
  eqsstri(c0, cr, (ℤ≥ ` c3))
  uzssre(c3)
  simpr((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0), s1[<]c6)
  suprubrnmpt(s1, hs0, (c3[...]c6), c1, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, ∃(hs0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈(c3[...]c6), c1[≤]hs0)), (c3[...]c6)∈ Fin, ∀(s1 ∈(c3[...]c6), c1 ∈ ℝ))
  ralrimia(s1, (c3[...]c6), w0, c1 ∈ ℝ)
  fimaxre3(s1, hs0, (c3[...]c6), c1)
  ad2antrr(w0, s1 ∈ c0, s1[<]c6, c5[≤]c2)
  syl6breqr(c5, cle, c2, if(c5[≤]c4, c4, c5), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, c5[≤]if(c5[≤]c4, c4, c5), c5 ∈ ℝ, c4 ∈ ℝ)
  eqeltrd(c5, cr, sup(ran((s1 ∈(c3[...]c6)↦ c1)), ℝ, <), w0)
  a1i(w0, c5 = sup(ran((s1 ∈(c3[...]c6)↦ c1)), ℝ, <))
  fisupclrnmpt(s1, (c3[...]c6), c1, cr, clt, w0)
  a1i(w0, < ≺ ℝ)
  ltso()
  fzfid(c3, c6, w0)
  ne0d((c3[...]c6), c3, w0)
  elfzd(c3, c3, c6, w0)
  syl(w0, c6 ∈ ℤ, c6 ∈ c0)
  eluzelz2(c6, c0, c3)
  leidd(c3, w0)
  zred(c3, w0)
  syl(w0, c3[≤]c6, c6 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c3))
  syl6eleq(c6, (ℤ≥ ` c3), c0, w0)
  eluzle(c6, c3)
  sylan2(w0, s1 ∈(c3[...]c6), c1 ∈ ℝ, s1 ∈ c0)
  sseldi(s1, c0, (c3[...]c6), s1 ∈(c3[...]c6))
  sseqtri((c3[...]c6), c0, (ℤ≥ ` c3))
  fzssuz(c3, c6)
  eqcomi((ℤ≥ ` c3), c0)
  id(s1 ∈(c3[...]c6))
  max1(c5, c4)
  rspce(s0, c2, cr, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, c1[≤]c2), ∀(s1 ∈ c0, c1[≤]s0))
  nfv(s0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, c1[≤]c2))

blocks.name: uzub
blocks.content: A set of reals, indexed by upper integers, is bound if and only if any upper part is bound. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)

thm uzub(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wrex(s0, cr, wrex(s1, c0, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0))))), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s2, c0, wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0))))))
  -| wnf(s2, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cz))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cuz, c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c0)), wcel(c1, cr))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)

thm infxrlesupxr(class c0, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → inf(c0, ℝ*, <)[≤]sup(c0, ℝ*, <))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ⊆ ℝ*)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ≠ ∅)
} = {
  mpd(w0, inf(c0, ℝ*, <)[≤]sup(c0, ℝ*, <), ∃(hs0, hs0 ∈ c0))
  syl(w0, ∃(hs0, hs0 ∈ c0), c0 ≠ ∅)
  biimpi(c0 ≠ ∅, ∃(hs0, hs0 ∈ c0))
  n0(hs0, c0)
  exlimdv(hs0, w0, hs0 ∈ c0, inf(c0, ℝ*, <)[≤]sup(c0, ℝ*, <))
  ex(w0, hs0 ∈ c0, inf(c0, ℝ*, <)[≤]sup(c0, ℝ*, <))
  xrletrd(inf(c0, ℝ*, <), sup(c0, ℝ*, <), hs0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ c0, inf(c0, ℝ*, <)∈ ℝ*)
  infxrcld(c0, w0)
  sselda(hs0, c0, cxr, w0)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ c0, sup(c0, ℝ*, <)∈ ℝ*)
  supxrcld(c0, w0)
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), inf(c0, ℝ*, <)[≤]hs0, c0 ⊆ ℝ*, hs0 ∈ c0)
  infxrlb(c0, hs0)
  supxrubd(hs0, sup(c0, ℝ*, <), c0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ c0, c0 ⊆ ℝ*)

blocks.name: ceilged
blocks.content: The ceiling of a real number is greater than or equal to that number. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 2-Jan-2022.)

blocks.name: infxrpnf
blocks.content: Adding plus infinity to a set does not affect its infimum. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 2-Jan-2022.)

thm infrpgernmpt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ∃(s0 ∈ c0, c1[≤](inf(ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), ℝ*, <)[+]c2)))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ≠ ∅)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℝ*)
  ⊣ (w0 → ∃(s1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, s1[≤]c1)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℝ+)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  mpd(w0, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, c1[≤](inf(ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), ℝ*, <)[+]c2)), ∃(hs0 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), hs0[≤](inf(ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), ℝ*, <)[+]c2)))
  infrpge(hs0, hs0, hs1, ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), c2, w0)
  nfv(hs0, w0)
  rnmptssd(s0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), cxr, c0, c1, w0)
  rnmptn0(s0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), c0, c1, cxr, w0)
  rnmptlb(hs0, hs1, s0, c0, c1, w0)
  sylib(w0, ∃(hs0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, hs0[≤]c1)), ∃(s1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, s1[≤]c1)))
  cbvrexv(s1, hs0, cr, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, s1[≤]c1), ∀(s0 ∈ c0, hs0[≤]c1))
  ralbidv(s0, c0, s1 = hs0, s1[≤]c1, hs0[≤]c1)
  breq1(s1, hs0, cle, c1)
  rexlimdva2(hs0, ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), w0, hs0[≤](inf(ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), ℝ*, <)[+]c2), ∃(s0 ∈ c0, c1[≤](inf(ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), ℝ*, <)[+]c2)))
  syl21anc(((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)))∧ hs0[≤](inf(ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), ℝ*, <)[+]c2)), ∃(s0 ∈ c0, c1[≤](inf(ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), ℝ*, <)[+]c2)), w0, hs0[≤](inf(ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), ℝ*, <)[+]c2), ∃(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 = c1))
  simpll(w0, hs0 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), hs0[≤](inf(ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), ℝ*, <)[+]c2))
  simpr((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))), hs0[≤](inf(ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), ℝ*, <)[+]c2))
  ad2antlr(w0, hs0 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), hs0[≤](inf(ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), ℝ*, <)[+]c2), ∃(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 = c1))
  biimpi(hs0 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), ∃(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 = c1))
  ax-mp((hs0 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))↔ ∃(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 = c1)), hs0 ∈ 𝕌)
  vex(hs0)
  elrnmpt(s0, hs0, universe, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), c0, c1)
  eqid((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))
  imp((w0 ∧ hs0[≤](inf(ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), ℝ*, <)[+]c2)), ∃(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 = c1), ∃(s0 ∈ c0, c1[≤](inf(ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), ℝ*, <)[+]c2)))
  reximdai(s0, c0, (w0 ∧ hs0[≤](inf(ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), ℝ*, <)[+]c2)), hs0 = c1, c1[≤](inf(ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), ℝ*, <)[+]c2))
  nfan(s0, w0, hs0[≤](inf(ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), ℝ*, <)[+]c2))
  nfbr(s0, hs0, cle, (inf(ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), ℝ*, <)[+]c2))
  nfcv(s0, hs0)

  a1d(hs0[≤](inf(ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), ℝ*, <)[+]c2), s0 ∈ c0, (hs0 = c1 → c1[≤](inf(ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), ℝ*, <)[+]c2)))
  ex(hs0[≤](inf(ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), ℝ*, <)[+]c2), hs0 = c1, c1[≤](inf(ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), ℝ*, <)[+]c2))
  eqbrtrd(c1, cle, (inf(ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), ℝ*, <)[+]c2), hs0, (hs0[≤](inf(ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), ℝ*, <)[+]c2)∧ hs0 = c1))
  adantl(hs0[≤](inf(ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), ℝ*, <)[+]c2), hs0 = c1, c1 = hs0)
  eqcomd(c1, hs0, hs0 = c1)
  id(hs0 = c1)
  simpl(hs0[≤](inf(ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), ℝ*, <)[+]c2), hs0 = c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)

blocks.name: xnegre
blocks.content: An extended real is real if and only if its extended negative is real. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 2-Jan-2022.)

blocks.name: xnegrecl2d
blocks.content: If the extended real negative is real, then the number itself is real. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 2-Jan-2022.)

blocks.name: uzxr
blocks.content: An upper integer is an extended real. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 2-Jan-2022.)

blocks.name: supminfxr2
blocks.content: The extended real suprema of a set of extended reals is the extended real negative of the extended real infima of that set's image under extended real negation. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 2-Jan-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm supminfxr2(setvar s0, class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csup(c0, cxr, clt), cxne(cinf(crab(s0, cxr, wcel(cxne(cv(s0)), c0)), cxr, clt))))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, cxr))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  eqtrd(csup(c0, cxr, clt), cxne(cinf(crab(s0, cxr, wcel(cxne(cv(s0)), c0)), cxr, clt)), cxne(cinf(crab(hs0, cxr, wcel(cxne(cv(hs0)), c0)), cxr, clt)), w0)
  pm2.61dan(w0, wceq(csup(c0, cxr, clt), cxne(cinf(crab(hs0, cxr, wcel(cxne(cv(hs0)), c0)), cxr, clt))), wcel(cpnf, c0))
  3eqtr4d(csup(c0, cxr, clt), cxne(cinf(crab(hs0, cxr, wcel(cxne(cv(hs0)), c0)), cxr, clt)), cpnf, cxne(cmnf), wa(w0, wcel(cpnf, c0)))
  a1i(wa(w0, wcel(cpnf, c0)), wceq(cpnf, cxne(cmnf)))
  eqcomi(cpnf, cxne(cmnf))
  sylan(w0, wcel(cpnf, c0), wceq(csup(c0, cxr, clt), cpnf), wss(c0, cxr))
  supxrpnf(c0)
  xnegeqd(cinf(crab(hs0, cxr, wcel(cxne(cv(hs0)), c0)), cxr, clt), cmnf, wa(w0, wcel(cpnf, c0)))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cpnf, c0), wceq(cinf(crab(hs0, cxr, wcel(cxne(cv(hs0)), c0)), cxr, clt), cmnf))
  syl2anc(wcel(cpnf, c0), wceq(cinf(crab(hs0, cxr, wcel(cxne(cv(hs0)), c0)), cxr, clt), cmnf), wss(crab(hs0, cxr, wcel(cxne(cv(hs0)), c0)), cxr), wcel(cmnf, crab(hs0, cxr, wcel(cxne(cv(hs0)), c0))))
  a1i(wcel(cpnf, c0), wss(crab(hs0, cxr, wcel(cxne(cv(hs0)), c0)), cxr))
  elrabd(hs0, cmnf, cxr, wcel(cpnf, c0), wcel(cxne(cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(cpnf, c0))
  a1i(wcel(cpnf, c0), wcel(cmnf, cxr))
  mnfxr()

blocks.name: xnegred
blocks.content: An extended real is real if and only if its extended negative is real. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 2-Jan-2022.)

blocks.name: supminfxrrnmpt
blocks.content: The indexed supremum of a set of reals is the negation of the indexed infimum of that set's image under negation. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 2-Jan-2022.)

blocks.name: min1d
blocks.content: The minimum of two numbers is less than or equal to the first. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Feb-2022.)

blocks.name: min2d
blocks.content: The minimum of two numbers is less than or equal to the second. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Feb-2022.)

blocks.name: pnfged
blocks.content: Plus infinity is an upper bound for extended reals. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Feb-2022.)

blocks.name: xrnpnfmnf
blocks.content: An extended real that is neither real nor plus infinity, is minus infinity. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Feb-2022.)

blocks.name: uzsscn
blocks.content: An upper set of integers is a subset of the complex numbers. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Feb-2022.)

blocks.name: absimnre
blocks.content: The absolute value of the imaginary part of a non-real, complex number, is strictly positive. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Feb-2022.)

blocks.name: uzsscn2
blocks.content: An upper set of integers is a subset of the complex numbers. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Feb-2022.)

blocks.name: xrtgcntopre
blocks.content: The standard topologies on the extended reals and on the complex numbers, coincide when restricted to the reals. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Feb-2022.)

blocks.name: absimlere
blocks.content: The absolute value of the imaginary part of a complex number is a lower bound of the distance to any real number. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Feb-2022.)
